action.content:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

career

Related words are:

- practice
- living
- race

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!
CLUE: A path or journey in life that often involves professional development and progression. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
a path or journey in life that often involves professional development and progression guesses from the other player will start with guessend

You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: A path or journey in life that often involves professional development and progression. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

CLUE: A series of jobs or professions that one engages in over time, typically involving a certain level of expertise and often leading to advancement or specialization. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

a series of jobs or professions that one engages in over time typically involving a certain level of expertise and often leading to advancement or specialization guesses from the other player will start with guessend

CLUE: A series of jobs or professions that one engages in over time, typically involving a certain level of expertise and often leading to advancement or specialization. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

CLUE: A sequence of occupations or roles that a person follows, usually with the intention of improving their standing or expertise in a particular field. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

a sequence of occupations or roles that a person follows usually with the intention of improving their standing or expertise in a particular field guesses from the other player will start with guessend

CLUE: A sequence of occupations or roles that a person follows, usually with the intention of improving their standing or expertise in a particular field. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
